name: Kim
title: Team Lead
comment: I have been so lucky to have Svetlana on my team, a brave and enthusiastic woman! At a later stage in her career she decided to learn programming and web development, that requires a lot of guts! She is energetic and always seeks to learn more about programming and how to get better at her work. She jumps happily on any task given with a determined mind to solve it as soon as possible. I have no doubt, with that determination, that she will succeed to become a great developer.

name: Dmytro
title: Frontend Developer
comment: Svetlana is a very positive person with a lot of enthusiasm.  Her perseverance and thirst for knowledge can serve as an example.  She is sociable and responsive, and in combination with purposefulness, diligence and responsibility, these qualities allow her to solve many problems.

name: Ivan
title: React Developer
extra: prev. - PASV & Lectrum bootcamps, Project Co-worker
comment:
Svetlana worked closely with me on the same project. 
She had excellent JavaScript skills and had a knack for keeping everyone calm and productive during intense crunch periods. She is a passionate developer and worked professionally throughout the project. Any team would be lucky to have Svetlana and highly recommend her to any company.

name: Gala
title: Frontend Developer
extra: prev. - PASV & Lectrum bootcamps, Project Co-worker
comment: Svetlana is one of the most valuable people I have ever met. Both smart and professional. She is passionate about writing code and solving problems through the development of creative and innovative software. She has tremendous potential. Svetlana is vocal about ideas, respects her superiors and enthusiastically tackles every assignment as she is directed. She is friendly, easy to get along with and respected by her co-workers.
